text: Ogu duaahina nei, i mua nia mee huogodoo, goodou hudee hai hagamodu ma gaa hai godou hagababa. Goodou hudee hai hagamodu gi di langi be gi henuailala, be tei aha e de hilihili. Goodou helekai hua boloo, “Uaa” maa goodou gaa donu, ge “Deeai” maa goodou ga hagalee donu, gi dee too hua goodou gi lodo di hagi aga a God.5.12 Matthew 5.34-37
